title: Best bridal lingerie for 2019
text:

If you're a bride to be gearing up for your big day, you've probably already thought about what to wear under your dream dress. If you haven't yet thought about it, thank us later.

Bridal lingerie is almost as important as the dress after all, if you feel good you'll look good, right?

You'll want to make sure that whatever lingerie you decide on is comfortable and easy wearing as you'll likely be wearing it all day. You'll also want to make sure your lingerie flatters your silhouette under your dress.

Perhaps most importantly, you'll want to feel sexy in whatever you wear. It is your wedding night and it's a welcome treat for your new lifelong partner to enjoy after the festivities, if you know what we mean.

Best bridal lingerie for 2019

1. DKNY Intimates Sheers Cupped Strapless Bodysuit

If you're looking for an all round great set of lingerie to wear on your big day, this option from DKNY Intimates is an ideal option.

The bodysuit has sexy sheer panels and is versatile enough to go underneath your wedding dress no matter what the style. The straps are easily adjusted to cross back, normal or strapless designs.

At £70, it's a nice treat for yourself for one of the biggest events of your life. It'll keep you comfy throughout the day and ensure you look sexy for the shenanigans after.

Price: £69.99, Zalando - buy here now

2. ASOS DESIGN Miyu Satin Underwire Bodysuit

This satin bodysuit from ASOS is sexy, stylish and will keep you supported throughout your big day.

The burnt orange colour is both autumn/winter appropriate and adds a pop of colour to a stereotypically white garment.

Adjustable straps on the suit makes it the perfect undergarment for outfit changes, the cut-out, tailored fit detail is sexy but subtly sophisticated.

Price: £28, ASOS - buy here now

3. Lace Lingerie Bra Set

This four piece set from Amazon has everything you'll need to look as dreamy underneath, as you do all dressed up.

Included is a white laced bra and panties, with a garter belt and stockings to complete the look.

White is typically the traditional colour, but if you do want to sass things up a little, it's also available in a sultry red or black colour.

Price: £18.69, Amazon - buy here now

4. Essie Body

When elegant prettiness meets daring lace - you end up with a beautiful design like this, perfect for your wedding day/night.

This V-neckline and form fitting body is flattering for all body types and will sit seamlessly underneath your dress during the day; it'll also look equally as tempting after the festivities are over.

The dramatic cutout design at the back further ramps up the sensual look of this number.

Price: £295, Agent provocateur - buy here now

5. Savage X Fenty Lace Teddy

Look your sexiest yet and give your partner something special to remember on your wedding night.

This drop dead gorgeous pick from Rihanna's lingerie line, Savage X Fenty has a highly dramatic leg; as well as flattering lace and tulle shaped panels.

To complete the look there are detachable garter straps so you can add stockings of your choice. If it's sexy you want - why not go all the way?

Price: £96, Savagex - buy here now

6. B By Ted Baker Tie The Knot Bridal Kimono

Wouldn't it be great to look as fabulous the morning after your wedding as you did the night before? This simply elegant bridal kimono, from Ted Baker will give you an effortless 'I woke up like this' feeling.

Delicate lace trims and scalloped edges add a layer of uniqueness to this otherwise, fairly demure gown.

Price: £48, ASOS - buy here now

7. Reger by Janet Reger Ivory Pearlised Lace Suspender Belt

If you've already found the perfect lingerie set to wear on your big day, you might just be looking for small finishing touches to complete your look.

This ivory, lace suspender belt will give you the added sparkle you're looking for. The simple but statement sating piping is wedding appropriate and will make you feel extra sassy on your wedding day.

Price: £18.50, Debenhams - buy here now

8. Pour Moi Remix Chemise

For a simple and effective look to wear to bed on your wedding night, this Chemise from Next is affordable and elegant.

It's made from super soft micro fibre fabric that will gently caress the skin underneath you wedding frock. Pretty laced cups give this design an edge that you can enjoy on the wedding night and beyond.

Price: £34, Next - buy here now

9. Evelife Teddy Bodysuit

This halter neck, deep plunging bodysuit from Amazon is sexy, simple to wear and will flatter your body underneath your dress.

The laced trim is sweet and sexy and some added drama can be found at the back of the design, with a full sheer panelled back.

Price: From: £7.99, Amazon - buy here now

10. Tori Lace Body

This sultry mesh bodysuit from Boux Avenue screams subtle seduction and is perfect to ramp up the wedding evening.

The alluring style has delicate embellishments and sheer panels for an all the more striking look.

At 40 for the suit, it's a complete steal we're sure every bride o be can treat themselves to for their big days.

Price: £40, Boux avenue - buy here now
description: It's not just about what you wear on top after all, what's underneath matters just as much - especially on your big day. These are some of the best bridal lingerie sets we've found that you can buy now.
